pageTitle: GLOBAL SOURCES LTD (GSOL:NASDAQ GS): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4812=Global Sources Ltd. operates as a business-to-business media company that provides information and integrated marketing services with a focus on the Greater China market. It operates through Online and Other Media Services, Exhibitions, and All Other segments. The company uses English-language media to facilitate trade from Greater China to the world, as well as utilizes Chinese-language media to enable companies to sell to, and within, Greater China, as well as offers sourcing information to volume buyers and integrated marketing services to suppliers. It provides GlobalSources.com, an online marketplace with product information, specifications, and images; trade shows for the semiconductor, optoelectronics, fashion, and machinery sectors; advertising and marketing creative services; information to electronics engineers and executives in Asia; and other conference and events, as well as publishes various industry-specific trade magazines in print and digital formats. The company also organizes fair exhibitions and other exhibitions services on technology related issues; and licenses Global Sources Online, as well as offers catalog services. Global Sources Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda., 9593=Global Sources Ltd. announced unaudited consolidated earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported revenue of $22,203,000 against $34,470,000 a year ago. Loss from operations was $3,212,000 against profit from operations of $858,000 a year ago. Loss before income taxes was $2,758,000 against profit before income taxes of $1,238,000 a year ago. Net loss attributable to the company's shareholders was $2,127,000 or $0.07 per diluted share against net profit of $145,000 or $0.00 per share a year ago. Non-IFRS loss was $1,428,000 or $0.05 per diluted share against profit of $599,000 or $0.02 per share a year ago. LBITDA was $467,000 against EBITDA of $5,704,000 a year ago. Adjusted EBITDA was $21,000 against $5,905,000 a year ago. For the six months ending June 30, 2015, revenue is expected to be between $90.0 million and $92.0 million, IFRS EPS is expected to be between $0.15 and $0.19 and Non-IFRS diluted net income per share is expected to be between $0.19 and $0.23. Adjusted EBITDA is expected to be between $12.9 million and $14.1 million, as compared to $17.7 million in the first half of 2014., 8660=Global Sources Ltd. will be removed from Russell 2000 Index}
